1.content:
No one knows just how it got started. The two fetishes sometimes intersected, yes, but it was rare to see them together so much, especially since both were niche interests.

It started with just one video: Gangbang Gluttony. The plot, such as it was went as follows: Marta, a fat, 400-pound foxgirl in a schoolgirl outfit that didn't fit, the shirt showing off her belly and large, soft breasts and the skirt showing her tight-fitting panties at every opportunity, was attacked on the way home from high school, dragged into an alley and gang-raped by a trio of muscular wolves. But after they had their way with her, she turned the tables and devoured them all. She sat in the alley, savoring their visible struggles inside her massively bloated belly, the dialogue telling her how much she would love to turn them into fat. After a while, when the struggles died down, she got to her feet and waddled home, a smile on her face.

It became a cult hit over time, and was in high demand. A sequel was made, then another, then a different set of movies. Then more stars started showing up, people shelling out great amounts of cash to have the videos of what was dubbed Fat Vornography. The porn studio, which was certain that it wouldn't be popular, made everyone involved in the fat-and-vore fetish series VIPs. And to this day, people willingly volunteer to be prey in the videos and DVDs for the stars, all they need to do to participating being signing a waiver that says they are willing to be eaten.

It's a growing industry. And these are stories about some of the stars of Fat Vornography...

11.content:
Marta sipped her cola, smiling as she watched her grandchildren play on the park's jungle gym. Her three daughters and three sons sat nearby, discussing plans for the holidays, none of them minding the stars Marta got.

She was a well-known porn star, and still beautiful despite her near sixty years of age. Then again, when you literally way a ton like Marta did, a result of years of gluttonous predation, the fat tended to keep the wrinkles out, leaving her with just a head of distinguished, graying hair to show her age. She was huge, her fat, immense belly so huge that it could rest on the ground. Her cheeks were puffy and wide, her adorable face possessed of many chins. Her ass was huge, as were her breasts, her limbs so fat that movement was very difficult. (Ironically, this is part of what the people who bought her videos liked about her now, her being so fat that movement was difficult.) She could still walk around, albeit slowly and only with a board underneath her belly. She generally tended to use a cart when travelling casually, like she was today. She was clad in a red shirt that covered her breasts, but left her titanic belly bare, and a pair of red sweatpants, a darker shade than her fur.

She smiled warmly as one of her granddaughters came up to her and hugged her immense tummy. "Gramma?" she asked, "Can I has a cookie?"

Marta nodded, and gave the cute young girl a couple of the cookies from the plate she was eating. (Being that huge did come with the disadvantage of a huge appetite. But she liked eating, so it wasn't that bad.)

The immense fox looked over her children, all discussing what to do for an upcoming birthday party. Each one was a different species, the result of her couplings with her male co-stars. For her youngest and her oldest, a cat and wolf respectively, unfortunately, their fathers were meals. But thankfully, they didn't hate her. (It's hard to care about someone you never knew.)

Her children, a male wolf, tiger, and alligator, and a female fox, black panthress, and cat were all planning on a big birthday party for Marta's sister. Marta, for her part, was hoping to just enjoy the day with her children and her multitude of grandchildren. She was a popular porn star, however, and was unlikely to be left alone for long.

12.content:
Ororo sighed nervously as she entered the studio. The fat-bellied, tawny-furred young lioness looked again at the address on the card she had been given, and then at the sign on the door.

GLUTTONY STUDIOS
555 West Furfield Street
Argent, Kentucky 10910
Gluttons and Meals are all welcome here.

"I guess this is the place..." she said. She knocked on the door, and a rather friendly, pleasant male voice came over the intercom.

"Hello? Who's this?"

Ororo blinked and said, "Hello... I'm Oro..."

"Press the button on the comm panel, honey. I can see you, but I can't hear you."

Ororo blinked, noticing a security camera for the first time. She looked at the panel where the voice was coming from and noticed a 'call' button for the first time.

"Oh..." she said, pressing the button, "Hi... I'm Ororo Kendall... I put in an application for a job as a pred star here a couple weeks ago... This fox gave me his card and..."

"Hold it up to the camera, lemme see," the voice said.

Ororo nodded and held out the card, aiming it at the camera.

The camera whirred, as if zooming in, and the voice chuckled.

"Wow. Marco Drake gave you his card? He must really think you have some raw sex appeal and money-making potential. He NEVER gives out his card. Heheh, but from what I can see, he chose right. A cutie like you has definately got some potential."

Ororo blushed, smiling slightly. "Thank you..."

The voice chuckled again. "Wait right there, Ms. Kendall. I'll send someone out to let you in and show you around."
12.title: A Shy Lioness

121.content:
Ororo waited nervously at the gate, wondering if she was making the right decision. She loved the Fat Vornography videos, mainly because seeing huge, fat preds eat slender, athletic prey made her feel better about her weight and her lack of hunting ability, but she had never really considered joining them before. She didn't think she was sexy enough.

The sound of heavy footsteps caught her attention. Ororo turned, and blushed, seeing one of her favorite stars heading towards her.

It was Lucas Howlton, a ten-foot tall, almost 700 pound wolf who had starred in over fifty FV videos. His huge, bloated belly jiggled with each step, his immense ass shifting heavily from side to side with each heavy step, bulging out heavily over the sweatpants he wore. A smirk was on his chubby-cheeked face as he looked Ororo over, his eyes a piercing gold.

Ororo stared up at him in awe. "Oh my..." she said, blushing.

Lucas grinned. "Heh. Okay. I'm not in charge of interviews, but I think you'll be good at making money. The fans love cutie preds like you as much as they do alpha hunters like me."

Ororo blushed at the praise. "Can... Can I have your autograph?"

Lucas laughed, unlocking the gate and letting her in. "Sure thing, kid. Hell, if you get the job, we may end up bed together. C'mon in."

Ororo tried and failed not to titter gleefully at the thought. "Thank you," she said, hesitating a little and stepping over the threshold into the studio.

Lucas grinned. His stomach bulged a little, a face pressing out of his fat, and he smirked, patting it down.

Ororo blinked. "Did you just get done filming?"

Lucas nodded. "Yeah," he said, licking his lips, "I had a brief part in the third part of the Gluttony Unlimited series. Gobbled me up some tasty rabbits."

Ororo blushed. "Awww, I missed it."

Lucas chuckled. "I'll put you down for a free reserve copy."

Ororo blushed. "I'd appreciate it," she said.

Lucas smiled as he led her inside. "You wanna look around?" he said, "Maybe you'd like a snack? Or do you wanna go straight to the interview?"

125.content:
Ororo was nervous, knowing that this could be her one chance for fame and fortune. No longer would her girth be a cause for ridicule, if only she could land this gig.

She thought she had been forgotten when the speaker phone went silent, but there was definitely sounds coming from inside. She was so nervous waiting for someone to come down and answer the door that she nearly fell over when it opened, which would hardly have been the impression she was hoping to make.

“Hello, pleased to meet you I'm” But the stern looking security guard cut her off.

“So you're the latest hopeful are you?” The guard walked right up to the lioness, staring straight into her face.

Ororo felt her hackles rise, instinctively she wanted to meet this challenge but she couldn't afford to cause trouble. She mustn’t get into a dominance battle with the the cute security guard, especially as she hadn't even got a job yet.

“I'm here for a part in the videos. I'm an actress.” The blonde security guard raised an eyebrow at that and Ororo felt very nervous. It was true that a non-speaking part in the College production of the Lion King wasn't exactly Broadway, but she had acted.

“Of course you are, you all are.” The woman seemed to sniff in that crude way humans had when they found something they didn't like.

“The question is, are you here as predator or prey?” With that the woman in her human uniform turned her back on the lioness to fetch a clip board from the desk in the corner.

“I'm a lioness, of course I'm a predator.” Ororo could hardly believe that anyone, certainly not a human, could possibly think she was anyone's prey. It was making her angry and realising it she stilled her tail. She didn't want anyone to think she had a temper.

“So you think that you are a predator do you? Think you can swallow down prey on demand like a real Vore star do you?” The young security guard was almost standing nose to nose with the lioness when she said this, clearly trying to dominate the conversation.

With a juicy human female so close Ororo was sorely tempted to just gulp her down, prove that she had what it took. But satisfying though it was to consign this little female to her belly it would cost her a chance at a better future in the adult entertainment industry.

“I come from a long line of predators. Predators who dominated the plains of Africa.” Ororo was proud of her heritage, even if she herself had never gone further than the suburbs.

The blonde woman wrote something on the form, then without warning she poked Ororo's flabby belly.

“Looks like you're used to full meals anyway. But you do know that we expect erotic consumption of live prey.” The blonde rested a hand on the lionesses belly as she spoke, seemingly unaware of the effect she was having on Ororo's appetite.

“We do vore flicks here, not your common feeder videos you know.”

“We need actresses who can really eat big. Not just a Big Mac you know.”

Ororo had to swallow to stop herself drooling. She really wanted to eat this bitch, uniform and all.

“I can swallow anything. I'm a real vore Queen if you'll let me.” Ororo as getting really frustrated that this mere human was going to block her chance to be a star.

The blonde security guard looked up from her clip board as if considering the lioness.

“Open wide, lets see what you can do.” Reluctantly the Queen of the Jungle complied, suffering the indignity of having her bite measured. The uniformed guard noted the measurement on her clipboard.

“Bite diameter is adequate.” The girl didn't look that impressed.

“Come on, please give me a screen test at least.” Ororo was desperate, feeling her chance slipping away. She knew that with her qualifications it was either Vornography or flipping burghers in a fast food joint.

“Well I suppose we could. But you would have to sign our standard contract for the test.” The girl flipped a page on the clip board and without hesitation Ororo signed the form. She didn't bother reading it first.

“So you agree to our terms?” Ororo realised that she might have made a mistake, but it was too late now. The lioness nodded.

“You will have one chance to swallow a standard prey model and if you fail to do so then you will take a staring role in our next production. As prey yourself.” At those words another lioness walked in, her heavy rolls of belly fat making it clear that here was a true vore star.

“If you can't manage to swallow on first attempt then you'll be getting eaten yourself.” Suddenly Ororo wasn't so confident. She had committed herself now but she still didn't know what she was expected to swallow.

She had never actually swallowed a live animal before, not even a lamb. Looking at the other lioness' belly she realised that she might soon be contributing another layer of fat.

“What do I have to swallow?” Ororo knew she should have asked this before signing the contract.

The blonde security guard her clip board on the desk and walked back to the lioness.

“Do you think you can manage me?” The girl stood as if at attention, her small bust sticking out, thrusting her uniform covered breasts in the lionesses face.

“I'll certainly give it a go.” Ororo took hold of the cute security guard by the waist and lifted her off the ground as she opened her mouth wider than she had ever done before to engulf the girl's head. Then as the blonde's head touched the back of her throat Ororo swallowed, taking in the girls epaulette covered shoulders and her breasts.

Ororo would have liked to played with the uptight woman first but the thought of digesting the bitch that had humiliated her was more than enough.

With a few more swallows the lioness was able to sit back on her haunches and raise her head so that gravity finished the job of delivering the security guard to her belly. It was the best feeling ever to have a squirming girl in her belly, much better than the feeling she got from pigging out on fast food.

With a burp she patted her belly, felling the security guard twisting and turning within. Then her stomach started to make rumbling noises, a sign that digestion was taking place.

“Have I got the job?” Ororo asked the other lioness?

A smaller fox anthro stepped around the vore star and shook Ororo's paw.

“That was a great screen test.” He nodded at the cameras in the corners of the room. Ororo hadn't realised that she was already being filmed, and that clips of her first on-screen meal would be the trailer that advertised the start of her career as a vore star.

The lionesses stomach rumbled loudly before shrinking back to it's normal size and Ororo found herself coughing violently.

It was a loud, hacking cough just like a oversized house cat but instead of a hair ball she coughed up a bundle of part digested rags and a scattering of bones and teeth. That was all that remained of the cute blonde security guard she had eaten.

“Yes, a very good screen test indeed.” With that the fox anthro led Ororo into the main studio while an assistant swept the remains of the guard into the trash.

13.content:
Yuriko Takamoto calmly sipped her water bottle, her latest meal digesting away in her bloated stomach. The wolf had just finished shooting her latest video, "Geisha Sumo Shogun," a ridiculous video with more Asian stereotypes than she even knew existed. She knew she should probably be offended, but she'd done so many of them, and they admittedly were fun to make. Plus, the prey the studio ended up acquiring for their preds, in this case a quintet of Japanese squirrel siblings from Yuriko's old neighborhood in Kanto, was always delicious and squirmed so nicely.

Yuriko belched, the gray-furred wolf idly sratching an itch on one of her large, heavy breasts. She wasn't as fat as the other preds, having not done as many videos, but she was still massive, with a nice, balanced figure giving her a rounded, almost pear-shaped frame. Her ass was her largest feature, so soft and plush from overeating that it made almost everything she sat on comfortable.

One of the cameramen who spoke Japanese came over to chat with her, congratulating her on her latest video. She was still fairly new to the country, and didn't speak the language well (although she could read it fluently), so she appreciated the fact that he was willing to talk to her.

It was a good life, although honestly, she'd like to have a long term lover, rather than one just for eating. Preferably one who didn't mind that she preferred to work for herself, and in the porn industry...

14.content:
Alec's alarm went off, the flabby tiger grumbling and pawing for the clock. Once he shut the alarm off, he debated just going back to sleep. Sighing, he decided against it, knowing that he had a filming today and the producers, as small and edible as they were, got cranky when stars took off without calling in sick. And he felt perfectly fine.

Smacking his lips, the immense feline hefted his immense bulk to his feet. Clad only in a pair of sweatpants, he waddled out of his bedroom, his immense belly brushing against the sides of his hall as the seven foot hulking predator made his way to the kitchen. Alec smiled, patting his gut. He loved this feeling, loved the feel of his body filling up his house. The only real feeling that compared was the feel of someone wriggling around inside of his belly, helpless as they digested away and became a part of his fat, stretching his orange and black-striped fur even further.

It's the main reason he signed up to be a Fat Vornography star. He was a pred already, and loved to eat, but to keep his job options open, he kept slim and fit. But this... this was a dream job. He had collected all of the Fat Vornography videos ever since they first came out, and when he heard there were openings for preds, he immediately applied. After gaining enough weight, he began filming.

He was lazy at heart, and wanted to do nothing more than eat, fuck, and sleep. And in his role as a voraphilic fat porn star, he got to do that.

He loved his job.
14.title: Alec the Lazy Tiger

151.content:
A massive wildcat giggled, tapping at her phone as she wandered through the mall. Her huge body jiggled with every step, everyone else in the mall being careful to stay out of her way, knowing she could probably crush them with her weight. Despite her immense size, she doesn’t have even the slightest semblance of cellulite, stretch marks, or related maladies, and indeed, her belly doesn’t have a single roll; it’s completely, perfectly smooth and round, just like her fans liked it...

Just for fun, she kept careful track of how much weight she gained after eating somebody. Whichever part of her gains the most weight, well, she tallies them as having ‘gone’ to that part of their body. So far, over the years, about 140 people have ‘gone’ to her paunch, 132 to her butt and hips, and 107 straight to her chest, by her count. She also kept a journal of all the people she eats, just to remember them by. It was fun to scroll through random entries and reminisce about all the cool and tasty people she’s had the privilege of gurgling up over the years. It was almost nostalgic.

You may have noticed that that is about 379 people. How could she have eaten that many people and not be considered one of the most dreaded mass murders of the century, you ask? Well, it’s simple; they all wanted to be eaten! Sure, anthros have moved past their savage, primitive ways centuries ago… but still, that primitive part of people’s psyche still lingered. Predators wanted to be predators, and prey wanted to be prey. Thats just how it was. And when prey finally work up the courage to take the plunge, well… that’s when they end up ‘co-starring’ in one of her videos.

To stay on the right side of the law, however, she had to be careful what kind of species she eats. It was always okay to eat rabbits and rodents and such, since those species are severely overpopulated. If a species was simply ‘common’, she only got to eat them rarely… and if a species was anywhere near ‘endangered’, she was obligated to turn them down. This allows Fat Vornography to boast that it’s helping the community… after all, their stars are single-handedly managing the out-of-control local rabbit population!

Speaking of which, those rabbits were all over the place indeed, and it wasn’t long until she pumped right into one. While she was distracted by her phone, she accidentally bumped into some young rabbit man, and he practically bounced off of her huge belly, falling to the floor. He gasped as he landed on the ground, scraping his elbows. “What the hell? Hey, watch where you’re goin-” He was about to angrily shout. However, when he rolled over, his expression changed when he realized he recognized the massive, pudgy wildcat! “Oh, God!”

He immediately curled up into the fetal position, holding his big ears in front of his face. “N-no! Please! I-I’m so sorry!” He cried out in apparent terror. She tilted her head as she looked down on him, curious what he was so afraid about. “I have a wife and cubs! Well… I mean, I don’t, actually… but still! Pleease, just… d-d-don’t eat meeee!”

She smirked when she finally realized why he seemed so terrified. “Ha! I see my reputation precedes me!” The rabbit let's out a frightened gasp as she grabs him by his shirt collar, tugging him up onto his feet. Her huge maw slides open, and he thinks he’s a goner for sure… but instead of eating him, she just leans back and let's out a big, hearty laugh, attracting glares from passersby. “CHILLAX, dude! I’m not gonna eat ya! I don’t eat anybody, ‘less they ask me to!”

“W-what?” He started to calm down a bit when it became evident that the predatory wildcat wasn’t angry with him. “Really?”

“Yeah, man. I’m an actress, not some kinda monster!” She laughed, patting him on the back. “Ain’t nobody’s ever been stuffed into this tummy unless they WANTED to be stuffed in there.” With a giggle, she slapped her big, round gut, letting it jiggle delightfully.

He blushed at the sight, averting his gaze as he had to force himself not to stare. “B-but what about that one delivery guy in Surburban Bellystuffers 7?” He pointed out. “He was kicking and screaming and crying…”

“ACTING!” She did a little gesture with her hands. “Trust me! He was actually super into it!” He stood there, a little dumbstruck, as he started to rethink every video he’s ever watch. All those unwilling preys… he thought they were actually unwilling. But they were just actors? That actually made him feel… better. “And… Suburban Bellystuffers 7, huh? That’s pretty a pretty obscure cult film by now. You must be a real fan…” Her voice lowered, and she gave him a smug, toothy grin.

He immediately perked up, raising his hands. “N-no! Well, I mean… maybe...” He blushed a bit, awkwardly rubbing the back of his head as he averted eye contact with the massive wildcat. “I mean… I’ve watched, like every video you’ve been in! But not cause you eat people or anything! That part’s… scary! But… just because I… think you’re really pretty...”

She gave him a weird look… before laughing! That’s the first time she’s heard that one before! Usually, fans she met just started gushing about how hot it was when she ate so-and-so in so-and-so film. “Well, ain’t that just precious?” She giggled, the rabbit’s blush deepening as she ruffled his hair. “Well, I always love to meet my fans! I was just about to head into here, though...” She pointed into a nearby restaurant. “Maybe, if you’re willing to… ‘treat me to dinner’, we can have a chat, and I’ll answer any other questions you might have...”

His face reddened even more when the short rabbit man realized what he was implying.
151.title: BIG Cat

2.) Karen Harper. 600 pounds and the only human on-staff. Enjoys eating furs greatly and is the star of the 'Humanity's Revenge' series, although she has no problems associating with furs. Pregnant with twins by Demitri.

3.) Demitri Valen, a 900 pound wolf. Longtime lover of Karen and the father of her children. Very easy to get a long with and frequently used as the studio's representative because of how likeable he is.

info.brief_description: Vore, fatness, and sex combine in this interactive...
info.description:
Okay. The theme of this story is, essentially, that you are playing a character in a pornography studio where weight gain and vore are the primary themes of the videos/DVDs.

Scat/Watersports is not allowed. Everyone takes special digestives that makes that unnecessary, all right?

Sex is allowed, be it hetero, homo, or whatever. It's a porn studio, so sex is pretty much a given. Beastiality with normal animals is allowed, be it with human characters or furry characters.

Pregnancy is allowed, as is romance. Some semblance of plot is allowed as well.

The youngest characters I'll allow having sex is 16. Any younger and I'll delete the chapter.

Keep choice chapters to a minimum, please.

But most of all, I want you to have fun.
